pr_title: Split Unit duties into a Hangar class

timeline.message: Add a Hangar class to handle unit related actions
Move the Campaign to use the new Hangar
Split out sorted views of the hangar into HangarSorter
Move specialized requirements on getUnits to callers

timeline.author: Windchild292

replies.bodyText: Swore I got all of these, may not have pushed the change.
replies.author: sixlettervariables

timeline.bodyHTML:
Suggested change
UUID id = unit.getId();
if (id == null) {
id = UUID.randomUUID();
unit.setId(id);
}
units.put(id, unit);
if (unit.getId() == null) {
unit.setId(UUID.randomUUID());
}
units.put(unit.getId(), unit);
timeline.author: Windchild292

commits_in_main.message: continues work on track gui and rules
hook up stratcon rules manager to mekhq event bus
multiple bug fixes and hookup to actual campaign
Adding code for a log entry when swapping TOE force.
Split out cargo and hangar statistics from Campaign
Split out accounting from the Campaign
Move more financial reporting out of Campaign
Make testing Accountant easier for a Campaign
Make it easier to mock stats classes
Use Person directly instead of IDs in Unit
Use Person instead of an ID
Fix logic to check for Already Being Worked On
Moving to an enum for mission status
Merging useUnitRating with the UnitRatingMethod enum
Moving to using AbstractIcon for constants
Standardizing to use the PortraitChooser instead of the older icon selector
Use Units rather than their IDs
Do not use Unit IDs in Refits
Add tests for transport unit sets
Use new Warehouse type in Campaign (etc)
Move some event logic to the Warehouse
Move removing child parts to the Warehouse
Move spare part helpers to Warehouse and add tests
Clean up part events in Campaign
Move Hire Personnel for a Unit to an action
Don't use unit IDs for parts needing service
Move unnecessary unit logic from Campaign and into Unit
Add Quartermaster to manage machines and materiel
Swapping portrait generation to use system-based file path comparison
Moving portrait generation code into a random portrait generator
Swapping Genealogy and FormerSpouse to no longer use id when active.
Only return non-zero quantities of parts, fixing #2231
Use tested spare part consolidation logic
Moving ranks to their own folder
Moving ranks system names to the Rank XML file
Restore AtBContract references in the ContractMarket #2141
Add the ability to swap out instances of static classes
Do not display unknown armor types in the Parts In Use report, fixes #2298
PlayerColours, Colour Camo Standardization, and standardizing camo selector
Fixing colour camouflage during colour set
Applying requisite changes in other files
Fixing colour set and moving EntityImage to use proper camo type
Swapping to using streams for missions
Moving to only use getMissions when necessary
Renaming a bunch of personnel options
Starting to implement Automatic Company Generation
Continuing to work on an AtB Company Generator
Continuing to implement company generation and its options
Bugfixes and some code cleanup from personal review
Adding Unit::isConventionalInfantry to ensure the entity is null checked
Add logging and error trapping on daily unit maintenance #2427
Add error trapping to daily part maintenance, related to #2427
2442: Fixing Ranks Issues: Removing ancient migration and code, Using proper setter, and using the Ranks as the spinner
Use MM's new UnitNameTracker for name collisions
Continuing to work on the company generator
Improving default contract name and sort
2458: Adding Insufficient Astech warnings for MRMS and adding some more Astech/Medic pool functions
Moving the unit market changes into an individual branch that contains some parts of the contract market changes
Swapping to EmptyUnitMarket instead of null
Finishing up working on abstracting out the Unit Market
Swapping over to using a three tiered rank setup
Heavy simplification of rank profession code
2196: Swapping to a standardized display wrapper class for rank display
units deployed to StratCon tracks are ineligible for repairs
Adding the ability to create a custom rank system
Renaming the campaign rank system methods to properly handle rank system changes
Moving personnel rank changes to their proper location within person
Implementing multiple new procreation options and moving it to work based on a supplied date
Creating ScenarioStatus Enum and updating how scenarios are gotten
multiple bugs with ignoring scenarios; ground pirats on air maps
add text resources; remove campaign scenarios after ignoring in stratcon UI
code review changes; data fix; stop nagging once user hits 'no' once
Making initial faction changes for constructors and ordering
Making RandomOriginOptions, which will allow its use in multiple locations
Implementing auto-hiring pool on new day
Creating the backend implementation for random procreation modules
Renaming the directory from random procreation to procreation
2607: Starting to work on redoing the salvage calculations
2607: Properly calculating and paying for payment overages
Creating AtB Contract Type and AtB Morale Level enums
fix multiple issues generating fixed objective scenarios
2625: Properly Clear Tech Units on Person removal/retirement
Phase one of Campaign Preset rework
Phase Two: finishing internal work and starting on GUI implementation
Creating a base ignorable nag dialog for MekHQ and implementing it in all current new day nags
Force icon implementation migration from outdated previous branch
Adding UnitIcon, GM Tools implementation, and baseline for export
Applying personal code review changes and starting unit icon code
Apply overtime to the last chunk worked as well #2679
Fixing a few potential divide by zero issues
Further cleanups, and adding an astech team size constant
Fixing NPE warning and cleaning up the if statement
Fixing possible confusion of local and field warnings
Moving crew null check and fallback logic into Campaign::getShorthandedModForCrews
2558: Swapping removePerson to be object instead of id based
2558: Custom message for when dependants leave
Isolating RATs into the RAT Tab
bulletproofing for a couple of individual unit actions
274: Moving Era definitions to a file
Removing Person's Campaign save and switching to full pass-by-reference for Campaign
2754: Properly clearing Narc and iNarc Flags during scenario resolution
Reworking to use random origin options instead of the internally stored values
Removing MekHQ's version by swapping to a standardized suite version
Adding the ability to automatically have the Operational Status indicator be determined on a new day
Moving training XP assignment to AtB new day processing
2567: AtB Part Procurement uses proper campaign option
Fixing the active checks and removing the AtB casts
Adding prisoner and clanner options for procreation
Standardizing canMarry and adding clanner/prisoner options
Creating a divorce module, with a daily percentage-based random divorce setup
Adding localization to all MekHQ resource maps
2962: AtB Campaigns Now Properly Load with Automatic or Tech Acquisition Skills
Implementing the retirement and dependent stopgap options and option updates
Finishing dependent options and starting on retirement setup
Starting to implement the new options
Finishing the internal code for the retirement and dependent stopgaps
Actually print the stacktrace for individual exceptions
Cleaning up a bit of person creation
Adding missing nullable tag and fixing missing null handling for faction selector
Missed that a null faction is fine for planet generation
Removing all serialVersionUID uses in MekHQ
Applying changes from initial personal review
Updating everything using final PrintWriter so that they're up to date, so I have a nice way to track what's updated and what is not
SuiteOptions: Naming standardization and finishing initial setup
Initial code for creating standardized code utilities
Migrating a bunch of MHQ utility code to MM
3146: Properly handling null force to null force reassignment messages
Fixing two accidentally kept negations for Random Dependents Removal
Fixing a bunch of spacing readability issues
Modernize List::size to List::isEmpty and String::isEmpty to String::isBlank
Death Module: Initial Commit For the New Setup
Cleaning up and modernizing the death code
Standardizing Personnel Flags into their own setup instead of multiple previous setups
3260: Clear Makeshift Clubs Upon Return To MekHQ
Renaming the civilian role check to isCivilian, and adding missing logging for a civilian error
Modernizing finances XML read and write
Switching to a single retirement report
Ignore End Date for Scenario Assignment to Active Contracts
Renaming clearGenealogy to clearGenealogyLinks (as that's what it does), and more test progress
Lots more tests, largely simple ones
Removing duplicated name generation info from the campaign file
Fixing deprecated XML utility uses and fixing indentation issues for parts
3489: Adding Small Craft and DropShip Transport Support
Finishing adding the new option as a selection
Scenarios are now Scenarios, not Missions
Yearly Retirement Nag Now Follows Campaign Options
3558: RATs are Used Outside of AtB
Campaign Ops Unit Rating: Properly Calculate Personnel Numbers
Applying changes from testing and further rule reading
Phenotype Enum: Migrating Uses to Simplification Methods
Tearing out unused code and swapping to using a map
Standardize Mass Repair Mass Salvage naming to MRMS
3318: Add manual personnel payments that generate Finance debit
